text: The Magic Face is a 1951 American Austrian drama movie directed by Frank Tuttle and starring Luther Adler, Patricia Knight, Jaspar von Oertzen, William L. Shirer, Manfred Inger, Rolf Wanka, Erik Frey, Heinz Moog. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about actors Category:Movies directed by Frank Tuttle
title: The Magic Face
